alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Duval County through 915 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall and gusty winds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Around and just east of Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
